name: English US / fun.json
description: This file is for the `Fun` cog of the bot, containing translations for fun-related commands.
author: ScarlxtPink

data.fun.joke.description: This is the `/joke` command that fetches a random joke from an external API.
data.fun.joke.error: Could not fetch a joke at the moment. Please try again later.
data.fun.eightball.description: This is the `/8ball` command that provides a random answer to a yes/no question.
data.fun.eightball.error.no_question: Please provide a question for the 8ball to answer.
data.fun.eightball.title: Magic 8-Ball
data.fun.coinflip.description: This is the `/coinflip` command that simulates flipping a coin and returns either heads or tails.
data.fun.coinflip.title: Coin Flip
data.fun.roll.description: This is the `/roll` command that rolls a specified number of dice with a specified number of sides.
data.fun.roll.error.invalid_format: Invalid format! Please use the format XdY, where X is the number of dice and Y is the number of sides.
data.fun.roll.error.too_many_dice: You cannot roll more than {max_dice} dice at once.
data.fun.roll.error.too_many_sides: Dice cannot have more than {max_sides} sides.
data.fun.roll.error.non_positive_integers: The number of dice and sides must be positive integers.
data.fun.roll.error.higher_than_one: You must roll at-least a one-sided die.
data.fun.roll.title: Dice Roll
